title: Question:
author: LEECOIN86
content: Good news to anyone!LEE community is going to air drop 10% of leecoins about one month later.Any wallet address which holds more than 1M leecoins will be qualified to receive the same amout of leecoins from airdrops.Â Official website: www.lifeier.org

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Buying a token that is not listed anywhere currently all in the name of a 10% promise carries too much risk for anyone to take.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: The louder a coin's headlines, the more likely it is either a scam or a mediocrity. This coin has zero liquidity, zero trading volume, zero volatility, the project is not listed anywhere, no one knows anything about it, but for some reason it is in the amazing status. An ordinary shitcoin, which nobody needs, and which will never show anything significant in its life. So it will die on some unknown exchange, until it is delisted and completely forgotten about.
